weapon_description: A long spear tainted black by unrelenting battle, it shines with an ethereal glow beneath the ghostly blue light of the lantern-fire.
weapon_skill_description: For 3.5s after using an Elemental Burst, the equipping character's Lunar-Charged DMG dealt to opponents is increased by 84%. Additionally, after triggering a Lunar-Charged reaction, the equipping character will gain Requiem of Ruin: CRIT DMG is increased by 56% for 6s. They will also regain 16 Elemental Energy. Elemental Energy can be restored this way once every 14s.
